text:
San Francisco, CA - Enterprise Architect with Sales Experience - Onsite Only 
We are looking for a very senior level resource to join our Mobility team in San Francisco, CA. You must have enterprise architecture experience, be able to solution, have prior consulting experience as well as some sales experience. We are a technology consulting firm but there is the potential of 40% travel outside of SF. If you are interested in learning more, please send your resume and contact information to shanna.wright@parivedasolutions.com.
